css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1);border-style:solid;border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:2px;margin-left:auto;width:calc(50% - 0px);flex-basis:calc(50% - 0px);min-width:initial;justify-content:flex-end;flex-direction:row;align-items:flex-end;}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1);border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:2px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;top:0px;bottom:0px;left:-2px;right:-2px;z-index:2;}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),0);display:block;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u{width:calc(49% - 0px);flex-basis:calc(49% - 0px);}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u{width:calc(50% - 0px);flex-basis:calc(50% - 0px);}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u{border-top-width:2px;border-bottom-width:2px;width:100%;flex-basis:100%;height:250px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-6ad0280c-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-top-width:2px;border-bottom-width:2px;top:-2px;bottom:-2px;}}
